entry.title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: DFA consular offices in non-ECQ areas to resume ops on May 4

media:group.media:title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: DFA consular offices in non-ECQ areas to resume ops on May 4
media:group.media:description:
The Department of Foreign Affairs on Saturday said some consular offices in areas not under enhanced community quarantine (ECQ) will resume operations on Monday, May 4.

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras Weekend Express: May 2, 2020 [HD]
media:group.media:description:
Narito ang mga balitang ating tinutukan ngayong Sabado, May 2, 2020:
- Mga mamimili, dagsa sa palengke sa unang araw ng GCQ
- Dalawang senior citizen at isa umanong volunteer frontliner, hinuli dahil sa paglabag umano sa calibrated community quarantine
- Ilang pamilyang hindi nag-qualify sa SAP, dumidiskarte muna para kumita
- Mag-ama at kaibigang lalaki, patay matapos umanong uminom ng alak na posibleng hinaluan ng liniment
- Pamasahe sa tricycle at iba pang PUV sa ilang lugar na nasa ilalim ng GCQ, nagmahal
- Ilang bata, naligo sa Manila Bay
- DOH cases and deaths tally
- Mga residente sa Tondo District 1, dumagsa sa pamilihan para makapaghanda sa hard lockdown
- Kapuso celebrities, career sa kusina ngayong may ECQ
- Lalaki, patay matapos subukang sagipin ang 2 anak sa sunog sa Maharlika Village
- Sen. Angara, muling nagpositibo sa COVID-19 halos isang buwan matapos gumaling
- Pet owners, sinubukan ang DIY grooming sa kanilang mga alaga
24 Oras Weekend is anchored by Ivan Mayrina and Pia Arcangel, featuring top news stories from the Philippines. Visit GMA News Online (http://www.gmanews.tv/24Oras) for more.

entry.title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: 34 more Filipinos abroad test positive for COVID-19

media:group.media:title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: 34 more Filipinos abroad test positive for COVID-19
media:group.media:description:
The number of Filipinos abroad who have tested positive for the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) rose to 1,741 on Saturday with 34 new infections, the Department of Foreign Affairs (DFA) said.

entry.title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: Filipino priest died of coronavirus in Spain —report

media:group.media:title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: Filipino priest died of coronavirus in Spain —report
media:group.media:description:
A 72-year-old Filipino Augustinian priest died of coronavirus in León, Spain on May 1, a Catholic news site reported Saturday.
